name: Grafted
description:
Game Trigger Warning: Guns, Blood, Mild Pixelated Gore

You are a monster. Half man, and half feral dog merged together by a scientist and stored away in the depths of their lab. You don't want to stay however, you want to get out. By any means necessary.

Grafted is a game-jam game developed for the 2021 GMTK Jam in 48 hours, with the theme Joined Together. The game is primarily a stealth game, with sneaking and strategic dashes making up the main game-play. Dodge and attack you enemies at the right time to succeed

This is the game-jam version of the game, meaning there are some elements I would like to polish. The story is fairly non-existent and whilst I would have liked some atmospheric music, the lack of soundtrack has it's own tense charm. Please enjoy my game!

Credits:
Code, Art and Sound Effects done primarily by me, in Gamemaker Studio, MagicaVoxel and BFXR Respectively.
Guard design and Voxel model modified off of Max Parata's design, link can be downloaded here: https://maxparata.itch.io/voxel-dystopian-characters
